name: Vatlva
overview: Vatlva is a vehicle combat game with a top down perspective, in a 3d enviroment. Seems slow at first but don´t let this baby fool ya, it can be very entertaining, especially with human players (ypu can play up to 6 ), and most of the menus are in english.. You have a wide arsenal of weapons, and an awesome music by the man himself, Yuzo Koshiro. If you like multiplayer madness like Saturn Bomberman this is a must own.
